DOC.brief_title: Myocardial Injury Remifentanil-based Versus Sevoflurane-sufentanil Balanced Regimens OPCAB Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: To determine difference myocardial injury upon use different anesthesia regimen : remifentanil-based regimen versus sevoflurane-sufentanil balanced regimen . Patients undergo off-pump coronary artery bypass ( OPCAB ) surgery randomly allocate get remifentanil ( 0.75 mcg/kg/min ) propofol ( TCI effect-site concentration 0.8-1.5 mcg/ml ) ( Group -RP ) , remifentanil ( 0.75 mcg/kg/min ) sevoflurane ( end-tidal 0.8 vol % ) ( Group-RS ) , sevoflurane ( end-tidal 1.2-2.8 vol % ) -sufentanil ( TCI effect site concentration0.35-0.75 ng/ml ) ( Group-SS ) . Intergroup difference level Troponin I ( c-TnI ) creatine kinase-MB determine surgery ( control ) , vascular graft harvesting ( harvest ) , complete graft construction ( postgrafting ) , 1 day surgery ( postoperative ) .
